      • refineScore

        public double refineScore(double score)
        If the AlignmentType is a AlignmentType.LOCAL, then the given score is compared to the score returned by ScoringFunction.getLocalLimit() method. If the score value is bigger than the limit the score is returned unmodified, otherwise the ScoringFunction.getLocalLimit() is returned.
        Specified by:
        refineScore in class ScoringFunction
        Parameters:
        score - the score calculated
        Returns:
        a refined score value
